content.prompt:
Auckland Art Gallery Toi o Tāmaki, gift of Mr H E Partridge, 1915

In the painting shown, the artist most likely chose to depict the subject in profile to visually

choices.label: balance the composition through the use of formal symmetry
create the impression of a background that possesses great spatial depth
incorporate textural elements into an otherwise flat design
emphasize the face tattoo’s curvilinear design in contrast to the cloak’s geometric patterns

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
